text: Hi, I'm doing well. One of my options responded and asked for my portfolio so I added a lot more to it (although I haven't gotten around to changing the format yet) and I sent it off to them. Now I'm just eagerly awaiting their response. I decided that if they do accept me then I'll be going this year.
That sounds fantastic! Best of luck, rooting for you! Which university is this? :slightly_smiling_face:
